mapper.select:
select * from board where 1 = 1
and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (seq, title, writer, content, regdate) values ((select nvl(max(seq),0) from board)+1,#{title},#{writer},#{content}, CURRENT_DATE)
